name: Simple Life and Zombies
description:
Create and customize your character.

Look at the icons in the upper right corner, they inform you if your character is hungry, tired or bored.

Drag and drop him into the right room at home to meet his needs.

Put your character in the yard to kill the zombies walking there. And take him back home so that he can recover.

Used Assets:

- Music and SFX from Kenny Game Assets: https://kenney.itch.io/
